title: Got kicked out of server
body: i got kicked out of an aram game and now ive been wrongfully penalized for something i didn't do :( is there anything i can do?

replies.body: Even if a leave is unintentional, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat all leaves equally because it still causes everyone else a negative experience for being down a player.  The best thing you can do is continue playing without getting kicked off.  If this is happening due to any specific issue, let me know with more detail.  I'd be happy to help!
